availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Stephens (Montgomery County, KY, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Marchese Stewart Stephens. Father of Mary C. Stephens, Sidney E. Stephens, Peter H. Stephens, Clora E. Stephens, Kizzie Stephens and Alice L. Stephens. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1860. Resigned as magistrate of Montgomery County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, p. 228.
